mechanics.condition: Target is a creature of your choice, you can see it, and it is within range (30 feet)
mechanics.outcome: Target regains hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier

mechanics.condition: Target is an Undead or a Construct
mechanics.outcome: Spell has no effect on target

description_text: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
